title: Customer Service
text: I like Revolut a lot, but their customer service is probably one of the worst ones I‚Äôve ever encountered. I have been waiting for the response, in the Live Chat, for the past 45 minutes‚Ä¶ really hope they can fix that.

title: Hated it their is much better
text:
Useless & misinformed customer service. When I was done & wanted to close the account they ignored me after contacting customer service. Wasn‚Äôt a fan of the app either looks like an amateur built the UI. Can‚Äôt tell you the issues I have a complaint to Financial ombudsman is on its way. I also can‚Äôt stand these woke companies that seem to want to promote their own ideas on everyone. Online banks (apps) are gender & colour blind money is money & that‚Äôs what they should be focussed on not promoting ideas that don‚Äôt need to be defended when it comes to what they do. Wokeness gone mad ‚Ä¶ I‚Äôve closed my account. *Update * now they are asking me to contact them with a detailed explanation ( with a standard response obviously not reading mine)of the issues so that they can be resolved ..too late guys too late I‚Äôve closed the account. Moved on & am happy banking elsewhere perhaps you should deal with complaints while people have their accounts not after they have left !
Because of that I‚Äôve downgraded my review from 2 stars to just 1.

title: Bad third party verification used
text:
I‚Äôm trying to sign up with my social security number, a few weeks already but Revolut is rejecting it,
We called the social security office to confirm that my social security number is the correct one,
 
The agent on chat told me that they are using a 3rd party for verification,

We really do not understand why Revolut is using this 3rd party, if they can not do their job!?

title: Scam!
text:
I signed up for this app after being invited to collect ¬£11 as a promo for a purchase I made through the app. It's now a week later and though in that time I've recived several e-mails repeating the offeer, when I follow the instructions step by step, I get nothing. 

The develoiper will respond suggesting that I contact support, but I did that right away (and repeatedly) and have yet to get any response.

Avoid this app: it's a scam!

title: Transfer error
text: Revolute is useless. It‚Äôs customer service is a mess. Do not recommend anyone. 21 days ago made a transfer of 490 euros plus fees. My transfer is still nowhere and they cannot even explain where and why. Every day I get a new customer service person who writes long-reads how they suffer alongside me but I need to wait a few more days‚Ä¶And what is every day for 3 weeks. Occasionally (once-twice a week) they ask pretty much the same questions about the payment, it‚Äôs purpose etc and promise to resolve it soon‚Ä¶Today it is 3 weeks still they are not able to fix there mistake, not able even to understand and communicate it to me. Plus nowadays they introduce more fees on everything, becoming as expensive as a regular commercial bank. But not been able to provide case resolutions like a regular bank. Avoid!

title: very inconvenient and problematic registration

title: Don‚Äôt bother with the metal card for any of the benefits
text: I am a US cardholder. I‚Äôve enjoyed using the card for transactions throughout Latin America without any fees. That and to withdraw. However, beyond those two activities the card ends up being useless. When one of my flights was delayed 4 hours, I was unable to use the ‚Äúlounge access‚Äù benefit that supposedly comes with the card. The other perk that initially got me to join was the travel insurance. Well, if you take a look at the policy information, it‚Äôs all completely generic. There are no official insurance cards or certificates to be generated for official use, such as for visa applications. Although I have ‚Äúactive‚Äù travel insurance with Chubb allegedly, they informed me they are unable to generate or provide policy documents for individual policy holders. I spoke with support in-app as well as their Sure Assist through email. It‚Äôs very phony. Considering that I already have accounts in all of the countries I need, I will not be renewing my card for the following year. The highlight of this card was supposed to be the travel ease / international use, and unfortunately they don‚Äôt follow through with what they promise.

title: Worst interaction I ever had with a company
text:
I have been trying to verify my identity with this app for about 3 years. I submitted my SSN, picture of my ID and everything they requested and there is an e-mail that comes back every time saying they were not able to verify my account. I reached out to customer service that is almost non-existent, and instead of having a real person looking into this issue and verify me, they send me another robot generated message saying the same exact thing. This is just insanity.
I have to ask my husband to use his Revolut all the time because it‚Äôs impossible for me to make an account for myself. I gave them all the documents they needed and they cannot verify me? Is this a bad joke? 
Despite the fact that this app is a joke and the whole customer service doesn‚Äôt exist, like they have nobody working there, I still recommended everyone I knew to get Revolut when they told me that they were traveling in Europe. It‚Äôs just crazy how I am the only person I know who cannot make an account like I am some sort of criminal. It‚Äôs humiliating and frustrating.

title: Got my money and apparently ran with it
text:
I sent them $1000 from my bank which they confirmed receiving I received a message from them ‚ÄúEmily‚Äù requesting details on the transaction, ‚Äúroutine confirmation‚Äù I sent it . That was days ago. The deposit is still on the system as pending and they haven‚Äôt replied to a single message since then. My wife warned me it was a scam - loosing the money isn‚Äôt bad enough but having to be reminded of it for the rest of my marriage is worse! 
Company reached out to me and released the money when they said they would. Im leaving for Asia on Saturday for a year. Will post a new review soon!as soon as I check it out.

title: SCAM !
text: Everything worked great‚Ä¶ until I had an issue with my account and had to deal with the online chat with the revolut team. They played me for a whole week going back and forth lying about finally reverting my funds to my bank account only to refuse to do it in the end pretending they couldn‚Äôt correct my IBAN after they made a mistake copying it !!! SCAM ! Stay away from that bank.
